content: चमत्करणं, चमत्कारः, चमत्कृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Admiration, surprise. {@--2@} Show, spectacle. {@--3@} Poetical charm, that which constitutes the essence of poetry; चेतश्चमत्कृतिपदं कवितेव रम्या <ls>Bv. 3. 16</ls>; तदपेक्षया वाच्यत्यैव चमत्कारित्वात् <ls>K. P. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Riot, festive or angry riot.
